title: Lillian
description: Lillian, a vampire novellete that follows Lillian from the days of becoming a vampire at the hands of her first love. Alex is torn from her and she finds that she must now leave her home in England and find her way in the world on her own. Is Alex really dead or will the two lovers find one day find their way back to each other?Also included for you reading pleasure the first few chapters of Katrina, the Beginning and Phantom Lives - Collier to introduce you to other works by Elizabeth Loraine
author: Elizabeth Loraine
